actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to require that the revenues of any new taxes be used to reduce the Federal deficit, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to establish in the Treasury a Deficit Reduction Trust Fund. Appropriates to such trust fund any revenues received from any tax imposed after September 10, 1984. Sets forth requirements for the expenditure of funds from such trust fund.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to require that the revenues of any new taxes be used to reduce the Federal deficit, and for other purposes.
